before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"audpl","text":"Ensure that you wear appropriate PPE during sampling (e.g. gloves, disposable lab coat, appropriate footwear,  facemask).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5vnji","text":"A protocol for the collection of environmental samples (sewage and wastewater) using Moore swabs and subsequent laboratory processing up to DNA extraction. This is part of a set of protocols for environmental surveillance of Salmonella Typhi. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":225,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blg0b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"871ue","text":"Bacteria in the wastewater are trapped in the Moore swab. Trapped bacteria are enriched during incubation in Universal Pre-Enrichment broth. The broth is then filtered under a vacuum to capture the bacteria on filter discs ready for DNA extraction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7vnr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3skca","text":"This protocol is adapted from the Moore swab protocol described in Liu et al (2021).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":71,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"2utuh","text":"Please note, the author list is in alphabetical order and does not reflect contribution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"o9nl","text":"It is recommended that sample collection be done in the morning.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
manuscript_citation: Liu P, Ibaraki M, Kapoor R, Amin N, Das A, Miah R, Mukhopadhyay A, Rahman M, Dutta S, Moe C (2021), Development of Moore Swab and Ultrafiltration Concentration and Detection Methods for Salmonella Typhi and Salmonella Paratyphi A in Wastewater and Application in Kolkata, India and Dhaka, Bangladesh. Frontiers in Microbiology, doi: 10.3389/fmicb.2021.684094

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b77jr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cdmqs","text":"Moore swabs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1627v","text":"Wide-mouth jars (500ml capacity)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dlnr","text":"Cold packs and ice box","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6774","text":"20ml pipet","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7sjs","text":"Membrane filtration apparatus","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"anqt0","text":"45mm 0.45um filter discs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93fjl","text":"Empty Powerbead tubes or equivalent (2ml screw cap microcentrifuge tubes)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ui7j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2gvtr","text":"Appropriate PPE (Disposable lab coats, nitrile gloves, face mask) and disinfectant","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":952685,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Universal Pre-Enrichment Broth","linfor":"","url":"https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/bd-difco-dehydrated-culture-media-universal-preenrichment-broth/DF0235178","sku":"DF0235-17-8","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"BA33AA10EACF11EB82625BC3B20D0977","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":159,"name":"Fischer status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d47s","text":"Sterilise Moore swabs by autoclaving prior to taking them to the field site.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c19r8","text":"Immerse the swab in the sewage or wastewater channel and tie it to a stable support using the tailing thread of the swab.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dfqtp","text":"Prepare 450ml of Universal Pre-Enrichment broth per sample, following the manufacturer's instructions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3425n","text":"Cut the thread of the Moore swab and transfer the swab to an appropriately labelled container with 450ml of UPE broth","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"640d","text":"Place the container on ice and transport back to the lab within 4 hours of sample collection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9ja9","text":"Incubate the container with the Moore swab in UPE broth at    for 21 - 24 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"lvdu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D20A1D7055B211EBBBC01FF199F9BB13","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4leb8","text":"After incubation, swirl the mixture and pipet two 20ml aliquots from the enrichment broth into 50ml conical flasks","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qvc9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bs55f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"r3v2","text":"Assemble the membrane filtration unit according the manufacturer's instructions and attach to the vacuum pump","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c1il8","text":"Using sterile tweezers, place a 47mm 0.45µm filter disc onto the filtration unit head and attach the filtration unit cup","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6sq5d","text":"Pipet the first 20ml sample into the filtration cup and turn on the vacuum to filter the sample through the disc","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8l5h4","text":"Once complete, cut the filter into several strips using sterile forceps then place the strips into an empty PowerBead tube. If possible, place the strips so that the \"dirty\" side faces the inside of the tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8gc5t","text":"Thoroughly disinfect filtration cups, containers and conical flasks after use to avoid cross contamination of samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Environmental sampling using Moore swabs
